item.description:
This Event is free to Red Sox Natives, fans, and stat geeks. The 2011 Edition of the BaseBall Prospectus is out. Lets find out what the experts are predicting for the 2011 Season at this Book Discussion.

Steve Goldman of the Baseball Prospectus Team will be on hand to share thoughts on the 2010 Season and answer questions. Now in its fifteenth edition, this New York Times best selling insiders guide remains hands down the most authorative and entertaining book of its kind.

The talk takes place in the Reading Room on Level Five and lasts about 1 hour plus and includes your chance to ask in depth questions.

I attended last year and it was standing room only.

This Barnes and Noble is located in the heart of Kenmore Square across from the Hotel Commonwealth.
item.how_to_find_us: If your picture is posted, you will find each other
item.why: It is an annual pre-season event.
item.name: BaseBall Prospectus ( Steve Goldman ) at BU Barnes & Noble
